name: Sky Hero2
description:
Classic simulation of the operation of aircraft combat game, control the fighter in the enemy anti-aircraft artillery under the cover, destroy the enemy's tanks, destroy the enemy's skyscrapers, destroy the enemy's transport airship, destroy the missile launch vehicle. Complete bombing missions!
Perfect mobile gravity sensor manipulation, different perspective, let you experience the shock of high altitude flight! Using the phone's multi screen interactive features to connect to the TV will make you more shocked! WIFI network warfare, allowing players to fight against themselves!
